data.name: asyncmd
data.description: asyncmd is a library to write concurrent code to run and analyze molecular dynamics simulations using pythons async/await syntax. Computationally costly operations can be performed locally or submitted to a queuing system.

evidence: "asyncmd is a library to write concurrent code to run and analyze molecular dynamics simulations" (library indicates it is imported as a dependency).
"asyncmd enables users to construct complex molecular dynamics (MD) workflows or develop and implement trajectory based enhanced sampling methods" (directly used to perform MD research workflows).
